title: Making a new ranked team
body:
Making a new ranked team looking for people silver/bronze/unranked you will need to have a mic so we can communicate and be willing to learn
we have mid and jg positions open and possible subs for the other so add me and msg me if you want to join or post a reply and i will follow it up thx

replies.body: i main mid annie but can play who ever the team needs am silver 4 but drop to b5 for fun atm i would deff like to join you guys if you have a spot still
Hey, i'm a gold V support main, was hoping that i would be able to join your team, been looking for awhile but cant find anything right now
